entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 11 except 8 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
